snippet.title: EVER FORWARD TRAILER
snippet.description:
Add to Wishlist on Steam: http://bit.ly/everforwardgame
Ever Forward is a 3D puzzle game — it is the story of a girl, Maya. Maya is lost in a strange world somewhere between reality and imagination. She is alone to confront her despair on her journey of discovery, where she must unlock her memories and confront her fears to unravel the secrets of the world. Players will need to use their observational skills and intelligence to solve multiple puzzles to discover the mystery of Maya's past and what dark secrets she has buried.

If you like, please press the like and subscribe.
To keep up to date with all the latest information on Ever Forward please follow our social media, 

Ever Forward Twitter:  https://twitter.com/EverForwardGame

Ever Forward Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Everforwardgame/  

Dev. Twitter:  https://twitter.com/PatheaGames

Dev. Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PatheaGames/

Dev. Instagram:  https://www.instagram.com/patheagames/
